title: Panel, 1750–99
medium: Medium: silk embroidered with metal thread and sequins on silk
description: Fragment of panel of pale blue silk grosgrain with border embroidered in gold metal thread and sequins in design of stiff symmetrical flower sprays connected by a linked chain.  Gold ribbon on three edges. Lined with white linen embroidered in cotton cross-stitch, lining probably part of a skirt originally.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 1750–99.
1750–99. Medium: silk embroidered with metal thread and sequins on silk. Gift of Leverton Harris. 1913-13-5-a.
